message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a truly exceptional item. I'm willing to let it go for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer, and I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13500. It's a fair price, considering the product's value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make a small concession. However, I need to make a living, so I'm going to have to draw the line at $14000. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value and uniqueness. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13500?
